title: ServiceNow Performance - ITAM Overview
description: This dashboard provides insights related to different aspects of IT asset and service management such as tracking physical and virtual assets, software license information, contracts related to assets, transfer of assets between locations or user

definition.content:
The ITAM (IT Asset Management) module in ServiceNow helps organizations track, manage, and optimize the lifecycle of their IT assets, ensuring efficient usage and compliance.

This dashboard provides insights related to different aspects of IT asset and service management such as tracking physical and virtual assets, software license information, contracts related to assets, transfer of assets between locations or users.

**Tips:**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.


For more information, see the [ServiceNow Performance Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/servicenow_performance/).
